attributes.action: have the High Court reconsider its decision to extradite Gary McKinnon to the USA
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gary McKinnon is due to be extradited to the US for a "crime?" commited in the UK, and for which the UK authorities decided there was no case to answer.
He is a British citizen with Aspergers Syndrome - a condition leading to compulsive, almost obsessive bahaviour. The US authorities have admitted there was no damage cause by his actions, but he is being threatened with up to 60 years in prison so that the UK can show how much its government repects the US/ UK  "Special Relationship".
The High Court have rejectd his right of appeal because there si no "general public importance" in his case!

rejection.details: This is a matter for the courts.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
